          <title>
            <string language="sl">Rastline in glive - raznolikost v naravi</string>
            <string language="en">Plants and fungi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betriebe und Pilze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Usines et mycètes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Plantas e fungos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Piante e funghi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εγκαταστάσεις και μύκητες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plantas y hongos</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenci utrdijo predelano snov o kraljestvu gljiv in kraljestvu rastlin. Vprašanja se ravnajo po standardih znanja, ki jih določa učni načrt pri NIT v 4. razredu</string>
            <string language="en">Exercises (can be used as exam) regarding plants and fungi.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gliva</string>
            <string language="en">fungus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">rastlina</string>
            <string language="en">plant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">cvet</string>
            <string language="en">flower</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">goba</string>
            <string language="en">mushroom</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übungen (kann als Prüfung verwendet werden), 
betreffend Betriebe und Pilze.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercices (peut être utilisé comme examen) 
concernant des usines et des mycètes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercícios (pode ser usado como o exam) a 
respeito das plantas e dos fungos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitazioni (può essere usato come exam) per 
quanto riguarda le piante ed i funghi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασκήσεις (μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως διαγωνισμός) 
σχετικά με τις εγκαταστάσεις και τους μύκητες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ejercicios (puede ser utilizado como examen) con 
respecto las plantas y a los hongos.</string>
          </description>
